entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 3.
